content:
See https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/92980#issuecomment-1065644848 :)
However I am not quite sure which teams have to FCP this.
Should be libs api for the main stabilization. You're probably as qualified as anyone to know if the intrinsic should be stabilized as const.
I think I've included both in a stabilization request before just for certainty.
Correct me if I'm wrong, but last I checked, stabilizing an intrinsic as const needs T-lang as well.
I think it technically does. But I would imagine most would defer to Ralf's knowledge of the situation tbh
It kicked it off with both teams.
one more week (realistically, more like 5 days) left for FCP to start in time such that we can get this into the next beta :D
hm, I guess we'll miss this merge window :/
